title: Our Nanny Takes Care Of Everyone
itunes:title: Our Nanny Takes Care Of Everyone
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old married woman and my husband and I had our first child 6 months ago. My husband is a musician and he’s back to traveling a lot, so he suggested that we hire a nanny. I welcomed the help and when my son was 2 weeks old, we hired a 26 year old girl that had just moved to the US from Belize. She is beautiful inside and out and she has a big family so she’s been helping raise children since she was 12 years old..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old married woman and my husband and I had our first child 6 months ago. My husband is a musician and he’s back to traveling a lot, so he suggested that we hire a nanny. I welcomed the help and when my son was 2 weeks old, we hired a 26 year old girl that had just moved to the US from Belize. She is beautiful inside and out and she has a big family so she’s been helping raise children since she was 12 years old..............
